engChrName: Still, you don't hear about monsters attacking buses very often lately.
engSearchText:
Still, you don't hear about monsters attacking buses
very often lately.
jpnChrName: それにしても、バスが魔獣に襲われるとは 最近じゃ珍しいな。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、バスが魔獣に襲われるとは
最近じゃ珍しいな。

engChrName: It's at times like this that I wish there was a bracer in the village...
engSearchText:
It's at times like this that I wish there was a bracer in
the village...
jpnChrName: こういう時にこそ、村に遊撃士が来てれば こっちも助かるんだが……
jpnSearchText:
こういう時にこそ、村に遊撃士が来てれば
こっちも助かるんだが……

engChrName: That famous A-ranker came by some time ago. I was on duty at the time, but I was still blown away by her swordsmanship.
engSearchText:
That famous A-ranker came by some time ago. I was
on duty at the time, but I was still blown away by
her swordsmanship.
jpnChrName: 前には噂のＡ級の子も来たが、あの剣技には 職務中だってのに見惚れちゃったもんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
前には噂のＡ級の子も来たが、あの剣技には
職務中だってのに見惚れちゃったもんだよ。

engChrName: Putting the bus accident aside, I'm just glad nobody was hurt.
engSearchText:
Putting the bus accident aside, I'm just glad nobody
was hurt.
jpnChrName: バスの事故に関してはとりあえず、 けが人がいなくて何よりだった。
jpnSearchText:
バスの事故に関してはとりあえず、
けが人がいなくて何よりだった。

engChrName: I'd better issue a report about those monsters, too.
engSearchText: I'd better issue a report about those monsters, too.
jpnChrName: 魔獣についても、一応報告を上げてく。
jpnSearchText: 魔獣についても、一応報告を上げてく。

engChrName: This village has a lovely peaceful atmosphere, so I'm glad that the monsters didn't cause any casualties.
engSearchText:
This village has a lovely peaceful atmosphere, so I'm
glad that the monsters didn't cause any casualties.
jpnChrName: この村は平和な雰囲気が良いところだからな、 魔獣による犠牲も無くて良かったよ。
jpnSearchText:
この村は平和な雰囲気が良いところだからな、
魔獣による犠牲も無くて良かったよ。

engChrName: Sorry, but I gotta focus on repairing this bus right now.
engSearchText:
Sorry, but I gotta focus on repairing this bus
right now.
jpnChrName: 悪いが今はこのバスの修理に集中したくてな。
jpnSearchText: 悪いが今はこのバスの修理に集中したくてな。

engChrName: If you need anything, just talk to my apprentice in the workshop at the back.
engSearchText:
If you need anything, just talk to my apprentice in the
workshop at the back.
jpnChrName: 用があるなら、奥の工房にいる弟子に言ってくれ。
jpnSearchText: 用があるなら、奥の工房にいる弟子に言ってくれ。

engChrName: She might not be fully qualified, but she can modify orbments no problem.
engSearchText:
She might not be fully qualified, but she can modify
orbments no problem.
jpnChrName: 半人前だが、オーブメントの調整くらいは 問題無くこなせる。
jpnSearchText:
半人前だが、オーブメントの調整くらいは
問題無くこなせる。

engChrName: Just give her the chance to hone her skills, won't you?
engSearchText: Just give her the chance to hone her skills, won't you?
jpnChrName: まあ、経験を積ませてやってくれ。
jpnSearchText: まあ、経験を積ませてやってくれ。

engChrName: If you're looking for my workshop, it's at the back of the church.
engSearchText:
If you're looking for my workshop, it's at the back of
the church.
jpnChrName: 俺の工房なら教会の裏手の方だ。
jpnSearchText: 俺の工房なら教会の裏手の方だ。

engChrName: My apprentice should be there keeping an eye on the store, so talk to her if you need anything.
engSearchText:
My apprentice should be there keeping an eye on the
store, so talk to her if you need anything.
jpnChrName: 弟子が番をしてるから、そっちを頼ると良い。
jpnSearchText: 弟子が番をしてるから、そっちを頼ると良い。

engChrName: Who would have thought we'd get attacked by monsters while the engine had broken down? There was something weird about them, too. Can't deny I was scared.
engSearchText:
Who would have thought we'd get attacked by
monsters while the engine had broken down?
There was something weird about them, too.
Can't deny I was scared.
jpnChrName: エンジントラブル中に魔獣に襲われるとは…… あの魔獣も何か変だったし、正直恐かったよ。
jpnSearchText:
エンジントラブル中に魔獣に襲われるとは……
あの魔獣も何か変だったし、正直恐かったよ。

engChrName: It's fortunate that none of my passengers were hurt, but does this still count as putting them in danger...?
engSearchText:
It's fortunate that none of my passengers were hurt,
but does this still count as putting them in danger...?
jpnChrName: ……乗客にケガ人がいなくて幸いだが、 危険には曝した事にはなるのかな……
jpnSearchText:
……乗客にケガ人がいなくて幸いだが、
危険には曝した事にはなるのかな……

engChrName: It was inevitable, right? I won’t be held responsible, will I?
engSearchText:
It was inevitable, right? I won’t be held responsible,
will I?
jpnChrName: 不可抗力だよな、俺は責任問われないよな？
jpnSearchText: 不可抗力だよな、俺は責任問われないよな？

engChrName: Still, I can't help but feel bad about the delay...
engSearchText: Still, I can't help but feel bad about the delay...
jpnChrName: しかし、自分は悪くないとは言え 遅延に関しては申し訳ないな……
jpnSearchText:
しかし、自分は悪くないとは言え
遅延に関しては申し訳ないな……

engChrName: I was petrified about the complaints I'd get, but it seems like the repair work is in good hands. That takes a little bit of the stress off.
engSearchText:
I was petrified about the complaints I'd get, but it
seems like the repair work is in good hands.
That takes a little bit of the stress off.
jpnChrName: クレームが怖いのもあるが、修理にあたって くれている人の手際が良さそうで少し安心したよ。
jpnSearchText:
クレームが怖いのもあるが、修理にあたって
くれている人の手際が良さそうで少し安心したよ。

engChrName: Who would have thought I'd get held up in an accident on my long-awaited trip to Remiferia?
engSearchText:
Who would have thought I'd get held up in an
accident on my long-awaited trip to Remiferia?
jpnChrName: せっかくのレミフェリア旅行だったのに、 まさか事故で足止めされるなんてね……
jpnSearchText:
せっかくのレミフェリア旅行だったのに、
まさか事故で足止めされるなんてね……

engChrName: Oh well. Doing some sightseeing in this village should lift my spirits.
engSearchText:
Oh well. Doing some sightseeing in this village
should lift my spirits.
jpnChrName: まあ、気分を切り替えてこの村を観光するわ。
jpnSearchText: まあ、気分を切り替えてこの村を観光するわ。

engChrName: There's always something interesting discover, no matter where you go. That's why I can never give up traveling.
engSearchText:
There's always something interesting discover, no
matter where you go. That's why I can never give
up traveling.
jpnChrName: どんな場所でも何かしらの発見がある、 だから旅行はやめられないのよ。
jpnSearchText:
どんな場所でも何かしらの発見がある、
だから旅行はやめられないのよ。

engChrName: If I hadn't gotten stuck in this village, I might not have discovered this hidden gem. iIf you look it at that way, I actually got lucky.
engSearchText:
If I hadn't gotten stuck in this village, I might not
have discovered this hidden gem. iIf you look it at
that way, I actually got lucky.
jpnChrName: 村に留まるのもこの際、旅先が一つ増えたと 思えば何てことはないわ。
jpnSearchText:
村に留まるのもこの際、旅先が一つ増えたと
思えば何てことはないわ。

engChrName: I travel practically every month anyway.
engSearchText: I travel practically every month anyway.
jpnChrName: どの道、毎月のように旅行してるしね。
jpnSearchText: どの道、毎月のように旅行してるしね。

engChrName: Last month, I went to Crossbell. Their theme park is worth a visit, let me tell you that.
engSearchText:
Last month, I went to Crossbell. Their theme park is
worth a visit, let me tell you that.
jpnChrName: ちなみに先月はクロスベルに行ったんだけど、 あそこのテーマパークは一見の価値ありよ。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに先月はクロスベルに行ったんだけど、
あそこのテーマパークは一見の価値ありよ。

engChrName: Ah! N-no, this isn’t, I’m not...
engSearchText: Ah! N-no, this isn’t, I’m not...
jpnChrName: ……ひっ！ ち、違うんだ、自分は……
jpnSearchText:
……ひっ！
ち、違うんだ、自分は……

engChrName: N-no... nothing, never mind. D-don’t bother yourself with me... please?
engSearchText:
N-no... nothing, never mind. D-don’t bother yourself
with me... please?
jpnChrName: い、いや……やっぱり何でもない…… か、構わないでくれ……ください……
jpnSearchText:
い、いや……やっぱり何でもない……
か、構わないでくれ……ください……

engChrName: (Huh? Was he looking at me?)
engSearchText: (Huh? Was he looking at me?)
jpnChrName: （何だ、俺を見て言ってんのか？）
jpnSearchText: （何だ、俺を見て言ってんのか？）

engChrName: (He seems to be afraid... Is he an acquaintance of yours?
engSearchText:
(He seems to be afraid... Is he an acquaintance
of yours?
jpnChrName: （どうやら怯えているようですが……   お知合いですか？）
jpnSearchText:
（どうやら怯えているようですが……
お知合いですか？）

engChrName: (Nope, no idea who he is.)
engSearchText: (Nope, no idea who he is.)
jpnChrName: （いや、知らんな。）
jpnSearchText: （いや、知らんな。）

engChrName: (Well, something’s up with him but we’ve got other priorities.)
engSearchText:
(Well, something’s up with him but we’ve got
other priorities.)
jpnChrName: （事情がありそうだが、俺たちにも優先順位がある。）
jpnSearchText: （事情がありそうだが、俺たちにも優先順位がある。）

engChrName: (Let’s just leave him be for now.)
engSearchText: (Let’s just leave him be for now.)
jpnChrName: （一旦はそっとしておいてやろう。）
jpnSearchText: （一旦はそっとしておいてやろう。）

engChrName: T-They’ve already come all the way out here....? No. No, it can’t be... but he’s clearly not your average person...
engSearchText:
T-They’ve already come all the way out here....? No.
No, it can’t be... but he’s clearly not your
average person...
jpnChrName: こ、こんなところまでもう……？ いや、でもまさか……だがタダ者では……
jpnSearchText:
こ、こんなところまでもう……？
いや、でもまさか……だがタダ者では……

engChrName: (You wouldn't be that scared if you had nothing to hide...)
engSearchText:
(You wouldn't be that scared if you had nothing
to hide...)
jpnChrName: （どうも後ろめたい事がありそうな怯え方だな……）
jpnSearchText: （どうも後ろめたい事がありそうな怯え方だな……）

engChrName: (Best to keep an eye on him, I suppose.)
engSearchText: (Best to keep an eye on him, I suppose.)
jpnChrName: （一応注意しておくとするか。）
jpnSearchText: （一応注意しておくとするか。）

engChrName: As for myself, I'm a fisherman from the Republic's branch of the Fisherman's Guild.
engSearchText:
As for myself, I'm a fisherman from the Republic's
branch of the Fisherman's Guild.
jpnChrName: 自分は《釣公師団（ちょうこうしだん）》共和国支部の釣り師でね。
jpnSearchText: 自分は《釣公師団（ちょうこうしだん）》共和国支部の釣り師でね。

engChrName: I arrived here yesterday to assess the water quality and develop some new fishing spots, but...
engSearchText:
I arrived here yesterday to assess the water quality and
develop some new fishing spots, but...
jpnChrName: 水質調査と釣り場開拓で昨日から来てるんだが……
jpnSearchText: 水質調査と釣り場開拓で昨日から来てるんだが……

engChrName: I came back from fishing to find there'd been some sort of incident.
engSearchText:
I came back from fishing to find there'd been some
sort of incident.
jpnChrName: 釣りから帰って来てみれば何かあったのようだね。
jpnSearchText: 釣りから帰って来てみれば何かあったのようだね。

engChrName: It's probably best to stay inside for now.
engSearchText: It's probably best to stay inside for now.
jpnChrName: 今は外に出るのは危なかったりするのかな。
jpnSearchText: 今は外に出るのは危なかったりするのかな。

engChrName: I got a bike last year, and I have to admit, it's made my work in the outskirts so much easier.
engSearchText:
I got a bike last year, and I have to admit, it's made
my work in the outskirts so much easier.
jpnChrName: 去年から自転車を持っているんだけど、 お陰でこういう郊外での活動が一段と捗るね。
jpnSearchText:
去年から自転車を持っているんだけど、
お陰でこういう郊外での活動が一段と捗るね。

engChrName: Riding it is fun in itself. It's almost as popular as fishing now.
engSearchText:
Riding it is fun in itself. It's almost as popular as
fishing now.
jpnChrName: 自転車そのものも楽しいし、最早釣りに次ぐ 趣味になりつつあるよ。
jpnSearchText:
自転車そのものも楽しいし、最早釣りに次ぐ
趣味になりつつあるよ。

engChrName: I feel like our bikes even influence which fishing spots we choose nowadays.
engSearchText:
I feel like our bikes even influence which fishing spots
we choose nowadays.
jpnChrName: 最近は釣りポイントの選び方が、 自転車ありきになってる感すらあるな。
jpnSearchText:
最近は釣りポイントの選び方が、
自転車ありきになってる感すらあるな。

engChrName: Hey, did you see that cute green-haired guy on the bus? You don't find cool people like that around here.
engSearchText:
Hey, did you see that cute green-haired guy on
the bus? You don't find cool people like that
around here.
jpnChrName: ねぇ、バス客の中にいた緑髪のイケメン見た？ この辺にはいないタイプだからすっごい新鮮！
jpnSearchText:
ねぇ、バス客の中にいた緑髪のイケメン見た？
この辺にはいないタイプだからすっごい新鮮！

engChrName: I bet you see cool people like that in the city all the time, don’t you? Ugh, now I’m even more desperate to save up and move away!
engSearchText:
I bet you see cool people like that in the city all the
time, don’t you? Ugh, now I’m even more desperate
to save up and move away!
jpnChrName: 都会にはああいうお洒落さんが普通にいるのかな？ うー、これはお金貯めて移住したい欲が高まるー！
jpnSearchText:
都会にはああいうお洒落さんが普通にいるのかな？
うー、これはお金貯めて移住したい欲が高まるー！

engChrName: If he was on the bus, then maybe he stopped by the inn.
engSearchText:
If he was on the bus, then maybe he stopped by
the inn.
jpnChrName: バスのお客なら宿屋にも寄ったのかな？
jpnSearchText: バスのお客なら宿屋にも寄ったのかな？

engChrName: Maybe he's talking to Ran. I'd better ask where he went later.
engSearchText:
Maybe he's talking to Ran. I'd better ask where he
went later.
jpnChrName: ならランはあの人と話してたりするのかな。 あとでどこ行ったかとか聞いてみよっと。
jpnSearchText:
ならランはあの人と話してたりするのかな。
あとでどこ行ったかとか聞いてみよっと。

engChrName: Welcome to the Creil Church... Oh, is something amiss?
engSearchText:
Welcome to the Creil Church... Oh, is
something amiss?
jpnChrName: ようこそクレイユ礼拝堂へ…… おや、どうかされましたか？
jpnSearchText:
ようこそクレイユ礼拝堂へ……
おや、どうかされましたか？

engChrName: No... Pardon me, are you of Central-Eastern heritage?
engSearchText:
No... Pardon me, are you of
Central-Eastern heritage?
jpnChrName: いえ……もしかして中東系の方でしょうか。
jpnSearchText: いえ……もしかして中東系の方でしょうか。

engChrName: It’s a little surprising to see you working in a church around here.
engSearchText:
It’s a little surprising to see you working in a church
around here.
jpnChrName: この辺りの教会にもいらっしゃるとは意外です。
jpnSearchText: この辺りの教会にもいらっしゃるとは意外です。

engChrName: Ah, tourists sometimes find it a bit surprising as well.
engSearchText: Ah, tourists sometimes find it a bit surprising as well.
jpnChrName: ええ、たまに観光の方にも意外に思われますね。
jpnSearchText: ええ、たまに観光の方にも意外に思われますね。

engChrName: I might not look like it, but I was actually born and raised in this village.
engSearchText:
I might not look like it, but I was actually born and
raised in this village.
jpnChrName: こう見えても私、生まれも育ちもこの村なんです。
jpnSearchText: こう見えても私、生まれも育ちもこの村なんです。

engChrName: After I’d finished my training and returned from the Holy City, I was approached to serve in some of the Central-Eastern temples, but...
engSearchText:
After I’d finished my training and returned from the Holy City,
I was approached to serve in some of the Central-Eastern temples, but...
jpnChrName: 修行を終えて法国から帰る時には、首都などの 中東系寺院への打診も頂きましたが……
jpnSearchText:
修行を終えて法国から帰る時には、首都などの
中東系寺院への打診も頂きましたが……

engChrName: I was already set on the idea of becoming a sister for the village I was born in.
engSearchText:
I was already set on the idea of becoming a sister
for the village I was born in.
jpnChrName: あくまで、生まれ故郷のためにシスターになると 決めていましたので。
jpnSearchText:
あくまで、生まれ故郷のためにシスターになると
決めていましたので。

engChrName: Wow, talk about being loyal to your roots.
engSearchText: Wow, talk about being loyal to your roots.
jpnChrName: へぇ、地元愛ってやつか。
jpnSearchText: へぇ、地元愛ってやつか。

engChrName: Now that ya mention it, I remember hearin' that lot of old immigrant families made this place their home back in the day.
engSearchText:
Now that ya mention it, I remember hearin' that lot
of old immigrant families made this place their home
back in the day.
jpnChrName: そういやここらは、結構昔の移民の家系も 馴染んでるんだっけか。
jpnSearchText:
そういやここらは、結構昔の移民の家系も
馴染んでるんだっけか。

engChrName: That's right. Everyone in this village is like family.
engSearchText: That's right. Everyone in this village is like family.
jpnChrName: ええ、村の皆は家族のような者ですから。
jpnSearchText: ええ、村の皆は家族のような者ですから。

engChrName: As fellows in this village, other differences are fairly minor in comparison.
engSearchText:
As fellows in this village, other differences are fairly
minor in comparison.
jpnChrName: 村人同士、違いなんて意識した事もありません。
jpnSearchText: 村人同士、違いなんて意識した事もありません。

engChrName: I see... So this village is like one big family, too.
engSearchText: I see... So this village is like one big family, too.
jpnChrName: なるほど……この村も、一つの家族なんですね。
jpnSearchText: なるほど……この村も、一つの家族なんですね。

engChrName: This place is pretty different from my home back in Kruga, but we sure have that in common. It's no wonder I feel such an affinity to this place.
engSearchText:
This place is pretty different from my home back in
Kruga, but we sure have that in common. It's no
wonder I feel such an affinity to this place.
jpnChrName: クルガの里とも違いますが、どうりで壁の無い 一体感を感じた訳です。
jpnSearchText:
クルガの里とも違いますが、どうりで壁の無い
一体感を感じた訳です。

engChrName: A lot of people advised me to go to a chapel or temple in a bigger town, but I've never regretted my decision.
engSearchText:
A lot of people advised me to go to a chapel or
temple in a bigger town, but I've never regretted
my decision.
jpnChrName: 大きな町の礼拝堂や寺院に行く事を勧める人も 多かったですが、一度も後悔していませんよ。
jpnSearchText:
大きな町の礼拝堂や寺院に行く事を勧める人も
多かったですが、一度も後悔していませんよ。

engChrName: I get to watch over my father, my brother, and all the other villagers who've taken care of me from here.
engSearchText:
I get to watch over my father, my brother, and all the
other villagers who've taken care of me from here.
jpnChrName: 父や弟、そしてお世話になってきた村の人たちを この礼拝堂から見守れるのですから。
jpnSearchText:
父や弟、そしてお世話になってきた村の人たちを
この礼拝堂から見守れるのですから。

engChrName: I work as a hunter around 'ere.
engSearchText: I work as a hunter around 'ere.
jpnChrName: 俺はここいらで猟師をやってるモンでな。
jpnSearchText: 俺はここいらで猟師をやってるモンでな。

engChrName: I’m just on my way back from a hunt... and I heard a bus was attacked by monsters or something?
engSearchText:
I’m just on my way back from a hunt... and I heard a
bus was attacked by monsters or something?
jpnChrName: 今しがた遠征から帰ったところなんだが…… 何でも、バスが魔獣に襲われたってな？
jpnSearchText:
今しがた遠征から帰ったところなんだが……
何でも、バスが魔獣に襲われたってな？

engChrName: As a hunter, keeping monsters away is my responsibility. I'll have to search the area later.
engSearchText:
As a hunter, keeping monsters away is
my responsibility. I'll have to search the area later.
jpnChrName: 魔獣対策も猟師の役目だからな、 後で近場を探っておこう。
jpnSearchText:
魔獣対策も猟師の役目だからな、
後で近場を探っておこう。

engChrName: I might not have seen them with my own eyes, but from what I've heard, those monsters were acting pretty strange. That's cause for concern.
engSearchText:
I might not have seen them with my own eyes, but
from what I've heard, those monsters were acting
pretty strange. That's cause for concern.
jpnChrName: 事故を直接見た訳じゃないが、聞く限り 魔獣の様子がおかしいのは気になるな。
jpnSearchText:
事故を直接見た訳じゃないが、聞く限り
魔獣の様子がおかしいのは気になるな。

engChrName: Hopefully it's just my imagination, but I have a bad feeling about this... Even the beasts look sort of frightened.
engSearchText:
Hopefully it's just my imagination, but I have a bad
feeling about this... Even the beasts look sort
of frightened.
jpnChrName: 杞憂だと良いが、嫌な予感もするな…… 心なしか、獣達も怯えているように見える。
jpnSearchText:
杞憂だと良いが、嫌な予感もするな……
心なしか、獣達も怯えているように見える。

engChrName: Whine... Grrr...
engSearchText: Whine... Grrr...
jpnChrName: ウウウウ……ガルルルル……
jpnSearchText: ウウウウ……ガルルルル……

engChrName: As you can see, our pup sees himself as something of a guard dog as well.
engSearchText:
As you can see, our pup sees himself as something of
a guard dog as well.
jpnChrName: 見ての通りだ、うちのわんこも 警戒モードになってやがる。
jpnSearchText:
見ての通りだ、うちのわんこも
警戒モードになってやがる。

engChrName: Rrrrr... Woof!
engSearchText: Rrrrr... Woof!
jpnChrName: ウウウウ……ワンッ！
jpnSearchText: ウウウウ……ワンッ！

engChrName: We’re an Eastern family, but apparently one of my ancestors was a pretty well-respected Eastern-style blacksmith.
engSearchText:
We’re an Eastern family, but apparently one of my
ancestors was a pretty well-respected
Eastern-style blacksmith.
jpnChrName: うちは東方系の家系なんだが、祖先に それなりの東方鍛冶師がいたようでね。
jpnSearchText:
うちは東方系の家系なんだが、祖先に
それなりの東方鍛冶師がいたようでね。

engChrName: It was that person's notes that inspired my daughter to go down the craftsman route. She's now training to become a technician over at the workshop.
engSearchText:
It was that person's notes that inspired my daughter
to go down the craftsman route. She's now training to
become a technician over at the workshop.
jpnChrName: 娘がその人の手記に影響されて、職人の道に進むって 工房で技師として修行しているんだ。
jpnSearchText:
娘がその人の手記に影響されて、職人の道に進むって
工房で技師として修行しているんだ。

engChrName: I'd hate to stop her from pursuing her dreams, but I don’t really think there’s any connection between the kinds of professionals who work in modern workshops and old blacksmiths, myself...
engSearchText:
I'd hate to stop her from pursuing her dreams, but I
don’t really think there’s any connection between the
kinds of professionals who work in modern
workshops and old blacksmiths, myself...
jpnChrName: 娘の夢は否定しないが、今の工房と昔の鍛冶師じゃ、 同じ職人でも勝手が違うとも思うけどなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
娘の夢は否定しないが、今の工房と昔の鍛冶師じゃ、
同じ職人でも勝手が違うとも思うけどなぁ……

engChrName: Incidentally, I’ve never been good at machines or smithing or any of that.
engSearchText:
Incidentally, I’ve never been good at machines or
smithing or any of that.
jpnChrName: ちなみに、俺自身は特に鍛治や 機械いじりの心得は無いよ。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、俺自身は特に鍛治や
機械いじりの心得は無いよ。

engChrName: Well, people say I’m a pro when it comes to fixing farming machinery...but I think they give me too much credit.
engSearchText:
Well, people say I’m a pro when it comes to fixing
farming machinery...but I think they give me too
much credit.
jpnChrName: まあ、日常的な農機具の整備は上手いって 言われるが……流石に買いかぶり過ぎだと思うな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、日常的な農機具の整備は上手いって
言われるが……流石に買いかぶり過ぎだと思うな。

engChrName: Did you enjoy our village’s famous galettes?
engSearchText: Did you enjoy our village’s famous galettes?
jpnChrName: うちの村の名物、ガレットは美味しかったかしら？
jpnSearchText: うちの村の名物、ガレットは美味しかったかしら？

engChrName: It seems people are almost shockingly unaware galettes are made with Eastern buckwheat flour, but...
engSearchText:
It seems people are almost shockingly unaware
galettes are made with Eastern buckwheat flour, but...
jpnChrName: ガレットに東方由来の蕎麦粉が使われているのは、 意外と知られていないようだけど……
jpnSearchText:
ガレットに東方由来の蕎麦粉が使われているのは、
意外と知られていないようだけど……

engChrName: From what I hear, it was my family’s ancestors that brought buckwheat flour here.
engSearchText:
From what I hear, it was my family’s ancestors that
brought buckwheat flour here.
jpnChrName: 蕎麦粉を持ち込んだのって、わたしの家系の ご先祖様だったらしいのよね。
jpnSearchText:
蕎麦粉を持ち込んだのって、わたしの家系の
ご先祖様だったらしいのよね。

engChrName: My husband and I manage the buckwheat milling.
engSearchText: My husband and I manage the buckwheat milling.
jpnChrName: 私は夫と一緒に、蕎麦挽きの管理をやっているわ。
jpnSearchText: 私は夫と一緒に、蕎麦挽きの管理をやっているわ。

engChrName: Honestly, all that stuff about my ancestors is just something stuck in my head. I just like my job because I’m proud to help with something the village is known for.
engSearchText:
Honestly, all that stuff about my ancestors is just
something stuck in my head. I just like my job
because I’m proud to help with something the village
is known for.
jpnChrName: 先祖がどうとか関係無く、 村の名物を支える仕事は誇らしいわね。
jpnSearchText:
先祖がどうとか関係無く、
村の名物を支える仕事は誇らしいわね。

engChrName: Oh, welcome to our village! We were just getting the fertilizer ready!
engSearchText:
Oh, welcome to our village! We were just getting the
fertilizer ready!
jpnChrName: おう、俺らの村へようこそ！ 今は肥料の準備をしていたところでなァ！
jpnSearchText:
おう、俺らの村へようこそ！
今は肥料の準備をしていたところでなァ！

engChrName: These days, all everybody talks about is galettes--but trust me, my pumpkins will put them to shame!
engSearchText:
These days, all everybody talks about is galettes--but
trust me, my pumpkins will put them to shame!
jpnChrName: 最近じゃガレットばかり有名だが、 俺の作るカボチャも負けとらんぜ！
jpnSearchText:
最近じゃガレットばかり有名だが、
俺の作るカボチャも負けとらんぜ！

engChrName: I'm going to display my fantastic pumpkins in the harvest festival. They don't just look good, but they taste great too!
engSearchText:
I'm going to display my fantastic pumpkins in the
harvest festival. They don't just look good, but they
taste great too!
jpnChrName: 収穫祭で立派なカボチャをお披露目したるよ、 見た目も味も良いって評判だからなァ！
jpnSearchText:
収穫祭で立派なカボチャをお披露目したるよ、
見た目も味も良いって評判だからなァ！

engChrName: Actually, my son and daughter are playing over by the river. Not that you'll notice much family resemblance!
engSearchText:
Actually, my son and daughter are playing over by
the river. Not that you'll notice much
family resemblance!
jpnChrName: そういや川辺の方に娘と息子がいると思うが、 あんまり似てなくてなァ！
jpnSearchText:
そういや川辺の方に娘と息子がいると思うが、
あんまり似てなくてなァ！

engChrName: It's great that my son has so much energy, but my daughter is a little too shy for my liking!
engSearchText:
It's great that my son has so much energy, but my
daughter is a little too shy for my liking!
jpnChrName: 息子は元気で何よりなんだが、 娘の方はちとばかり控えめでよ！
jpnSearchText:
息子は元気で何よりなんだが、
娘の方はちとばかり控えめでよ！

engChrName: It'd put her old man's mind at ease if she were a little more ballsy.
engSearchText:
It'd put her old man's mind at ease if she were a little
more ballsy.
jpnChrName: もう少し威勢が良いと、父親としちゃ 安心できるんだがなァ！
jpnSearchText:
もう少し威勢が良いと、父親としちゃ
安心できるんだがなァ！

engChrName: Ah, hello. Are you travelers? You don’t seem to be people who were on the bus.
engSearchText:
Ah, hello. Are you travelers? You don’t seem to be
people who were on the bus.
jpnChrName: あら、旅行者の人たちかしら？ バスの人とは違うようだけど。
jpnSearchText:
あら、旅行者の人たちかしら？
バスの人とは違うようだけど。

engChrName: I can’t recommend any exciting points, but our village is a relaxing, peaceful place. I hope you’ll be able to take it easy while you’re here.
engSearchText:
I can’t recommend any exciting points, but our village
is a relaxing, peaceful place. I hope you’ll be able to
take it easy while you’re here.
jpnChrName: 娯楽は無いけど、のんびりするには良い村よ。 何にしてもゆっくりしていくと良いわ。
jpnSearchText:
娯楽は無いけど、のんびりするには良い村よ。
何にしてもゆっくりしていくと良いわ。

engChrName: Oh, you should try some of the vegetables Martha sells herself! They’re all so good, they’re a secret little specialty of our village.
engSearchText:
Oh, you should try some of the vegetables Martha
sells herself! They’re all so good, they’re a secret little
specialty of our village.
jpnChrName: ここにいるマーサさんの直売野菜もどう？ どれも質が良くて、隠れた名物なの。
jpnSearchText:
ここにいるマーサさんの直売野菜もどう？
どれも質が良くて、隠れた名物なの。

engChrName: She carries the pumpkins we grow, too.
engSearchText: She carries the pumpkins we grow, too.
jpnChrName: あたしのところで作ってる カボチャも当然あるわ。
jpnSearchText:
あたしのところで作ってる
カボチャも当然あるわ。

engChrName: Galettes are, of course, what we’re known best for. Still, we’ve got plenty of crops here that are nothing but amazing.
engSearchText:
Galettes are, of course, what we’re known best for.
Still, we’ve got plenty of crops here that are nothing
but amazing.
jpnChrName: ガレットが特に有名だけど、他にも うちの村は色々と名産揃いよ。
jpnSearchText:
ガレットが特に有名だけど、他にも
うちの村は色々と名産揃いよ。

engChrName: My husband’s a slob, but even so, he can grow a pumpkin that’s far better than you’ll find in your average shop.
engSearchText:
My husband’s a slob, but even so, he can grow a
pumpkin that’s far better than you’ll find in your
average shop.
jpnChrName: うちのだらしない亭主が作るカボチャでさえ、 そこいらの品よりは質が良いっていうし。
jpnSearchText:
うちのだらしない亭主が作るカボチャでさえ、
そこいらの品よりは質が良いっていうし。

engChrName: Kent! I know you're pleased to have found a crab, but calm down a little, won't you?
engSearchText:
Kent! I know you're pleased to have found a crab, but
calm down a little, won't you?
jpnChrName: ケント、カニを見つけて嬉しいのは判るけど、 もう少し落ち着いて……
jpnSearchText:
ケント、カニを見つけて嬉しいのは判るけど、
もう少し落ち着いて……

engChrName: I don't want to slipping and hitting yourself against a rock... Ugh, just the thought of it sends a chill down my spine...
engSearchText:
I don't want to slipping and hitting yourself against
a rock... Ugh, just the thought of it sends a chill down
my spine...
jpnChrName: 滑って岩にぶつけでもしたら危ないんだから…… うう、ひやひやするよ……
jpnSearchText:
滑って岩にぶつけでもしたら危ないんだから……
うう、ひやひやするよ……

engChrName: I do envy my little brother's energy and curosity from time to time, but...
engSearchText:
I do envy my little brother's energy and curosity from
time to time, but...
jpnChrName: 弟の元気さとか好奇心が 羨ましくなる時もあるけど……
jpnSearchText:
弟の元気さとか好奇心が
羨ましくなる時もあるけど……

engChrName: The other week, he got these really scary-looking people to play with him... That was a worrying reminder of how fearless he really is.
engSearchText:
The other week, he got these really scary-looking
people to play with him... That was a worrying
reminder of how fearless he really is.
jpnChrName: 先々週に怖そうな人たちに遊んでもらった時は、 流石に怖いもの知らずだなって思ったよ……
jpnSearchText:
先々週に怖そうな人たちに遊んでもらった時は、
流石に怖いもの知らずだなって思ったよ……

engChrName: No way! There really was a freshwater crab here.
engSearchText: No way! There really was a freshwater crab here.
jpnChrName: いたいた、本当にいたよサワガニ！
jpnSearchText: いたいた、本当にいたよサワガニ！

engChrName: It was hiding in the exact spot the fisherman told me it would be!
engSearchText:
It was hiding in the exact spot the fisherman told me
it would be!
jpnChrName: 釣りのお兄ちゃんが言ってた通りの ところに隠れてる！
jpnSearchText:
釣りのお兄ちゃんが言ってた通りの
ところに隠れてる！

engChrName: I see killifish ALL the time, but it turns out that all these creatures were hiding under the rocks all along!
engSearchText:
I see killifish ALL the time, but it turns out that all
these creatures were hiding under the rocks all along!
jpnChrName: メダカさんはいつも見るけど、岩の下にも色々な 生き物がいるんだね！
jpnSearchText:
メダカさんはいつも見るけど、岩の下にも色々な
生き物がいるんだね！

engChrName: That fishing guy sure knows his stuff!
engSearchText: That fishing guy sure knows his stuff!
jpnChrName: 釣りのお兄ちゃんは物知りだなぁ！
jpnSearchText: 釣りのお兄ちゃんは物知りだなぁ！

engChrName: The other day, I got a whole bunch of jaegers to come and play with me!
engSearchText:
The other day, I got a whole bunch of jaegers to come
and play with me!
jpnChrName: こないだは、たくさんで来た リョーヘーの人たちにもあそんでもらったんだ！
jpnSearchText:
こないだは、たくさんで来た
リョーヘーの人たちにもあそんでもらったんだ！

engChrName: I thought my dad was strong until I met them. They even picked me up so I could pretend I was an airplane flying through the sky!
engSearchText:
I thought my dad was strong until I met them.
They even picked me up so I could pretend I was an
airplane flying through the sky!
jpnChrName: ボクのパパよりも力持ちで、ボクを持ち上げて 飛行艇ごっこしてくれたりとか！
jpnSearchText:
ボクのパパよりも力持ちで、ボクを持ち上げて
飛行艇ごっこしてくれたりとか！

engChrName: Hey there, travelers. Curious about the windmill?
engSearchText: Hey there, travelers. Curious about the windmill?
jpnChrName: おう、旅行者さん 風車が気になるかい？
jpnSearchText:
おう、旅行者さん
風車が気になるかい？

engChrName: This thing’s my partner. We use it to thresh wheat.
engSearchText: This thing’s my partner. We use it to thresh wheat.
jpnChrName: コイツは俺の相棒でな、 小麦の脱穀とかに使ってんだ。
jpnSearchText:
コイツは俺の相棒でな、
小麦の脱穀とかに使ってんだ。

engChrName: I mean, fresh veggies and buckwheat galettes are good and all, but bread’s your mainstay, right?
engSearchText:
I mean, fresh veggies and buckwheat galettes are
good and all, but bread’s your mainstay, right?
jpnChrName: 野菜も、蕎麦のガレットも美味いが、 やっぱり主食ったらパンだからよ。
jpnSearchText:
野菜も、蕎麦のガレットも美味いが、
やっぱり主食ったらパンだからよ。

engChrName: In a sense, we fill the stomach of the whole Republic here.
engSearchText:
In a sense, we fill the stomach of the whole
Republic here.
jpnChrName: ある意味、俺たちが共和国の胃袋を 握ってるようなもんなんだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ある意味、俺たちが共和国の胃袋を
握ってるようなもんなんだぜ。

engChrName: Common farmers like us are proud to grow any crop, but wheat just has a different feel to it.
engSearchText:
Common farmers like us are proud to grow any crop,
but wheat just has a different feel to it.
jpnChrName: 俺たち百姓にとっちゃどんな作物でも 育て甲斐があるが、麦は手応えが違う。
jpnSearchText:
俺たち百姓にとっちゃどんな作物でも
育て甲斐があるが、麦は手応えが違う。

engChrName: A golden wheat field, glistening all over... It's so exciting to think that something so dynamic will one day be made into bread.
engSearchText:
A golden wheat field, glistening all over... It's so
exciting to think that something so dynamic will one
day be made into bread.
jpnChrName: 一面に輝く金色の麦畑……あのダイナミックな 代物がパンになると思うと胸が躍るね。
jpnSearchText:
一面に輝く金色の麦畑……あのダイナミックな
代物がパンになると思うと胸が躍るね。

engChrName: Besides... You can’t make a beer without the right grains!
engSearchText:
Besides... You can’t make a beer without the
right grains!
jpnChrName: それに……麦が無きゃビールも飲めんしな！
jpnSearchText: それに……麦が無きゃビールも飲めんしな！

engChrName: Mister, you were talking about taking jobs from the people of the village. Are you a bracer?
engSearchText:
Mister, you were talking about taking jobs from the
people of the village. Are you a bracer?
jpnChrName: あんちゃん、村の皆が依頼をどうとか 言ってたけど、遊撃士なのか？
jpnSearchText:
あんちゃん、村の皆が依頼をどうとか
言ってたけど、遊撃士なのか？

engChrName: Actually, I wanna be a bracer, too...
engSearchText: Actually, I wanna be a bracer, too...
jpnChrName: 実はオレも遊撃士になりたいと思ってて……
jpnSearchText: 実はオレも遊撃士になりたいと思ってて……

engChrName: Sorry to disappoint, but I’m no bracer.
engSearchText: Sorry to disappoint, but I’m no bracer.
jpnChrName: いや、悪いが遊撃士じゃないな。
jpnSearchText: いや、悪いが遊撃士じゃないな。

engChrName: And I'm not the kind of guy you'd want as a role model, either.
engSearchText:
And I'm not the kind of guy you'd want as a role
model, either.
jpnChrName: お前の憧れるようなものでもねぇよ。
jpnSearchText: お前の憧れるようなものでもねぇよ。

engChrName: Really? Well, now that you mention it, you don't give off that vibe.
engSearchText:
Really? Well, now that you mention it, you don't give
off that vibe.
jpnChrName: そうなのか？　まあ、言われてみれば、 確かに雰囲気とかそれっぽくないもんな。
jpnSearchText:
そうなのか？　まあ、言われてみれば、
確かに雰囲気とかそれっぽくないもんな。

engChrName: Hmm, guess I jumped to conclusions.
engSearchText: Hmm, guess I jumped to conclusions.
jpnChrName: うーん、ちょとばかり早とちりしたな。
jpnSearchText: うーん、ちょとばかり早とちりしたな。

engChrName: Man though... Annie’s such a grownup.
engSearchText: Man though... Annie’s such a grownup.
jpnChrName: それにしても、アニーは立派だよなぁ。
jpnSearchText: それにしても、アニーは立派だよなぁ。

engChrName: The way she’s always watching out for that little brat of a brother she’s got, you know?
engSearchText:
The way she’s always watching out for that little brat
of a brother she’s got, you know?
jpnChrName: あのやんちゃな弟もちゃんと面倒見ていて……
jpnSearchText: あのやんちゃな弟もちゃんと面倒見ていて……

engChrName: Folks say she seems kinda weak-willed, but I don’t think she could take such good care of him if she wasn’t strong where it counts.
engSearchText:
Folks say she seems kinda weak-willed, but I don’t
think she could take such good care of him if she
wasn’t strong where it counts.
jpnChrName: 気弱そうとか言われる事もあるけど、 芯が強くなきゃ務まらないよ。
jpnSearchText:
気弱そうとか言われる事もあるけど、
芯が強くなきゃ務まらないよ。

engChrName: ...I’ve gotta get stronger, too.
engSearchText: ...I’ve gotta get stronger, too.
jpnChrName: ……オレもオレなりに強くならねぇと。
jpnSearchText: ……オレもオレなりに強くならねぇと。

engChrName: Welcome. Are you looking to buy something?
engSearchText: Welcome. Are you looking to buy something?
jpnChrName: いらっしゃい、お買い物かしら。
jpnSearchText: いらっしゃい、お買い物かしら。

engChrName: People love our vegetables even in the city, but I assure you, the veggies you’ll get here, freshly harvested with the scent of earth still on them, are the best.
engSearchText:
People love our vegetables even in the city, but I
assure you, the veggies you’ll get here, freshly
harvested with the scent of earth still on them, are
the best.
jpnChrName: この村の野菜は街でも評判だけど、やっぱり 土の匂いがするくらいの採れたてが一番よ。
jpnSearchText:
この村の野菜は街でも評判だけど、やっぱり
土の匂いがするくらいの採れたてが一番よ。

engChrName: I sell our produce direct from the farmers here, so your business would be welcome.
engSearchText:
I sell our produce direct from the farmers here, so
your business would be welcome.
jpnChrName: ここで直売をしているから、良かったら 買って行ってもらえると嬉しいわ。
jpnSearchText:
ここで直売をしているから、良かったら
買って行ってもらえると嬉しいわ。

engChrName: By the way, vegetables aren't all I stock. I have a few little trinkets on sale, too.
engSearchText:
By the way, vegetables aren't all I stock. I have a few
little trinkets on sale, too.
jpnChrName: ちなみに、野菜以外にも いくらか小物を売っているわ。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、野菜以外にも
いくらか小物を売っているわ。

engChrName: I do handicrafts in my spare time, you see. These accessories were all made by yours truly.
engSearchText:
I do handicrafts in my spare time, you see.
These accessories were all made by yours truly.
jpnChrName: ふふ、どれも私が趣味の手芸で 作ったアクセサリーなの。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、どれも私が趣味の手芸で
作ったアクセサリーなの。

engChrName: Hmm... I wasn’t expecting to get to the point where I can’t read my own ledger.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I wasn’t expecting to get to the point where I
can’t read my own ledger.
jpnChrName: うーむ……よもやいつの間にか、帳簿すら 読めなくなっておるとは……
jpnSearchText:
うーむ……よもやいつの間にか、帳簿すら
読めなくなっておるとは……

engChrName: I’ve grown old. Sad as it is to say.
engSearchText: I’ve grown old. Sad as it is to say.
jpnChrName: ワシも老いたもんじゃ、哀しいのう。
jpnSearchText: ワシも老いたもんじゃ、哀しいのう。

engChrName: I’m simply glad I have such a capable grandson...
engSearchText: I’m simply glad I have such a capable grandson...
jpnChrName: そして持つべきは出来た孫じゃな……
jpnSearchText: そして持つべきは出来た孫じゃな……

engChrName: Come to think of it, haven't we met somewhere before?
engSearchText:
Come to think of it, haven't we met
somewhere before?
jpnChrName: そういえばお客さん、 以前にどこかでお会いしましたか？
jpnSearchText:
そういえばお客さん、
以前にどこかでお会いしましたか？

engChrName: You haven't visited my shop before, by any chance, have you?
engSearchText:
You haven't visited my shop before, by any chance,
have you?
jpnChrName: もしかしてお店にいらした事が ありましたか？
jpnSearchText:
もしかしてお店にいらした事が
ありましたか？

engChrName: Sorry, but this is actually my first visit.
engSearchText: Sorry, but this is actually my first visit.
jpnChrName: いや、今回が初めてになるな。
jpnSearchText: いや、今回が初めてになるな。

engChrName: Hmm, it does feel like we’ve met before, though...
engSearchText: Hmm, it does feel like we’ve met before, though...
jpnChrName: うーん、多分お会いしたと思うのですが……
jpnSearchText: うーん、多分お会いしたと思うのですが……

engChrName: It takes him such a long time to remember his customers nowadays. All I can do is apologize...
engSearchText:
It takes him such a long time to remember his
customers nowadays. All I can do is apologize...
jpnChrName: お客さんの事を思い出すのに手間取るとは、 申し訳ない限りですね……
jpnSearchText:
お客さんの事を思い出すのに手間取るとは、
申し訳ない限りですね……

engChrName: Sorry you had to see that.
engSearchText: Sorry you had to see that.
jpnChrName: さっきは見苦しい所を見せて申し訳ない。
jpnSearchText: さっきは見苦しい所を見せて申し訳ない。

engChrName: My granddad’s been getting a lot worse since my parents died in a traffic accident.
engSearchText:
My granddad’s been getting a lot worse since my
parents died in a traffic accident.
jpnChrName: 祖父は僕の両親が交通事故で他界してから、 ボケと老眼が進行してしまっていて……
jpnSearchText:
祖父は僕の両親が交通事故で他界してから、
ボケと老眼が進行してしまっていて……

engChrName: I wish I could keep a closer eye on him, but the deliveries are my responsibility now my parents aren't around...
engSearchText:
I wish I could keep a closer eye on him, but the
deliveries are my responsibility now my parents
aren't around...
jpnChrName: 本当は近くで常にフォローしたいですが、 両親に代わり運送なども僕がやってるからどうしても……
jpnSearchText:
本当は近くで常にフォローしたいですが、
両親に代わり運送なども僕がやってるからどうしても……

engChrName: Thanks for your business. Did you like the galettes?
engSearchText: Thanks for your business. Did you like the galettes?
jpnChrName: まいどあり、ガレットは美味かったか？
jpnSearchText: まいどあり、ガレットは美味かったか？

engChrName: We serve different food in the evenings, but I assure you it's just as good. If you're staying the night, you should join us for dinner as well!
engSearchText:
We serve different food in the evenings, but I assure
you it's just as good. If you're staying the night, you
should join us for dinner as well!
jpnChrName: 夜もまた違った絶品料理を出してるから、 泊まるんなら晩もうちで食うと良いぜ。
jpnSearchText:
夜もまた違った絶品料理を出してるから、
泊まるんなら晩もうちで食うと良いぜ。

engChrName: I know there was some kind of accident, but there's no need to be overly nervous.
engSearchText:
I know there was some kind of accident, but there's
no need to be overly nervous.
jpnChrName: 事故もあったようだが、 あんたらは変に気を遣う事はねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
事故もあったようだが、
あんたらは変に気を遣う事はねぇ。

engChrName: My hospitality's going to make everyone glad they got held up!
engSearchText:
My hospitality's going to make everyone glad they got
held up!
jpnChrName: 足止めされた人らの事も、 俺がきっちりもてなしておくからよ。
jpnSearchText:
足止めされた人らの事も、
俺がきっちりもてなしておくからよ。

engChrName: Come to think of it, my daughter’s been baking our famous galettes almost more than I have lately.
engSearchText:
Come to think of it, my daughter’s been baking our
famous galettes almost more than I have lately.
jpnChrName: そういや、うちの名物のガレットだが、 最近は娘も焼く事が増えてきてな。
jpnSearchText:
そういや、うちの名物のガレットだが、
最近は娘も焼く事が増えてきてな。

engChrName: She’s probably gonna be a better cook than I am, soon. I’m excited to see just how good she’ll get.
engSearchText:
She’s probably gonna be a better cook than I
am, soon. I’m excited to see just how good she’ll get.
jpnChrName: 早くも俺より上手くなりそうな気配だ、 後々が楽しみだな。
jpnSearchText:
早くも俺より上手くなりそうな気配だ、
後々が楽しみだな。

engChrName: Those sorts of people actually stop by our village pretty often. Even I've got used to them by now.
engSearchText:
Those sorts of people actually stop by our village
pretty often. Even I've got used to them by now.
jpnChrName: 実はあの手の人たちが村に寄る事はちょくちょく あって、あたし達も慣れてるんだよね。
jpnSearchText:
実はあの手の人たちが村に寄る事はちょくちょく
あって、あたし達も慣れてるんだよね。

engChrName: In fact, I got along well with that leader lady who was with those folks from the other day.
engSearchText:
In fact, I got along well with that leader lady who was
with those folks from the other day.
jpnChrName: この前の人たちも隊長のお姉さんとは 仲良くなれたしね。
jpnSearchText:
この前の人たちも隊長のお姉さんとは
仲良くなれたしね。

engChrName: On that note, do you need any orbments modifying? We might be out in the sticks here, but we do have a proper workshop.
engSearchText:
On that note, do you need any orbments modifying?
We might be out in the sticks here, but we do have a
proper workshop.
jpnChrName: そういえばオーブメントの調整とかで困ってない？ 田舎だけど、ちゃんとした工房はあるよ。
jpnSearchText:
そういえばオーブメントの調整とかで困ってない？
田舎だけど、ちゃんとした工房はあるよ。

engChrName: My boss is repairing the bus right now, but I can vouch for my friend who's tending the store. You'll be in safe hands.
engSearchText:
My boss is repairing the bus right now, but I can
vouch for my friend who's tending the store. You'll be
in safe hands.
jpnChrName: 親方はバス修理をしてるけど、店番をしている あたしの友達の腕前も保証できるから安心してね。
jpnSearchText:
親方はバス修理をしてるけど、店番をしている
あたしの友達の腕前も保証できるから安心してね。

engChrName: I’ve got some business regarding health suppliments over in Remiferia.
engSearchText:
I’ve got some business regarding health suppliments
over in Remiferia.
jpnChrName: 自分はレミフェリアの方で、 栄養サプリ関連の商談を控えていてね……
jpnSearchText:
自分はレミフェリアの方で、
栄養サプリ関連の商談を控えていてね……

engChrName: I was worried the delay might be a problem, but I was able to contact the people I had an appointment with via the inn’s phone, and they were very understanding.
engSearchText:
I was worried the delay might be a problem, but I was
able to contact the people I had an appointment with
via the inn’s phone, and they were
very understanding.
jpnChrName: この遅延に最初は焦ったが宿で通信機を借りて、 先方に何とか納得してもらえたよ。
jpnSearchText:
この遅延に最初は焦ったが宿で通信機を借りて、
先方に何とか納得してもらえたよ。

engChrName: Now I'm under even more pressure to clinch the deal.
engSearchText: Now I'm under even more pressure to clinch the deal.
jpnChrName: その分、しっかり商談をまとめてこないとな。
jpnSearchText: その分、しっかり商談をまとめてこないとな。

engChrName: I get the impression that lots of the older villagers are involved in manual labor, since this is a farming village...
engSearchText:
I get the impression that lots of the older villagers are
involved in manual labor, since this is a
farming village...
jpnChrName: そういえば、この村も農村だけあって 肉体労働をする中高年が多そうだな……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、この村も農村だけあって
肉体労働をする中高年が多そうだな……

engChrName: Hmm, that supplement market could be promising. I should take a little look around so my time here doesn't go to waste.
engSearchText:
Hmm, that supplement market could be promising.
I should take a little look around so my time here
doesn't go to waste.
jpnChrName: ふむ、サプリの市場としては有望かもしれない。 時間を有効に使うためにも少し見て回るか。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、サプリの市場としては有望かもしれない。
時間を有効に使うためにも少し見て回るか。

engChrName: I take it you're the trainee blacksmith. Lemme see what you've got on sale.
engSearchText:
I take it you're the trainee blacksmith. Lemme see
what you've got on sale.
jpnChrName: 東方鍛冶の修行してるってのはアンタだな。 商品を見せてもらう事はできるか？
jpnSearchText:
東方鍛冶の修行してるってのはアンタだな。
商品を見せてもらう事はできるか？

engChrName: Ooh, someone's been doing their research.
engSearchText: Ooh, someone's been doing their research.
jpnChrName: へぇ、お兄さんよく知ってるね。
jpnSearchText: へぇ、お兄さんよく知ってるね。

engChrName: You say ＂trainee,＂ but I'm actually self-taught. If you're okay with the stuff I've made to practice, you can take them off my hands for free...
engSearchText:
You say ＂trainee,＂ but I'm actually self-taught.
If you're okay with the stuff I've made to practice, you
can take them off my hands for free...
jpnChrName: う～ん、と言っても独学だからなぁ。 習作で良ければ譲れるけど……
jpnSearchText:
う～ん、と言っても独学だからなぁ。
習作で良ければ譲れるけど……

engChrName: Bah, that doesn't bother me. I'm happy to pay a proper price.
engSearchText:
Bah, that doesn't bother me. I'm happy to pay a
proper price.
jpnChrName: ああ、それで構わない。 きちんと対価は支払うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、それで構わない。
きちんと対価は支払うぜ。

engChrName: Items have been added to Goddard Workshop!
engSearchText: Items have been added to Goddard Workshop!
jpnChrName: 《ゴダード工房》に商品が追加された！
jpnSearchText: <C1>《ゴダード工房》に商品が追加された！

engChrName: I was planning on fixing the bus myself, but I had to let my boss take care of it.
engSearchText:
I was planning on fixing the bus myself, but I had to
let my boss take care of it.
jpnChrName: 最初は、あたしがバスの修理をやろうと 思ったんだけど、親方に任せてもらえなくてさ。
jpnSearchText:
最初は、あたしがバスの修理をやろうと
思ったんだけど、親方に任せてもらえなくてさ。

engChrName: Hmph. I guess they're still treating me like an amateur.
engSearchText:
Hmph. I guess they're still treating me like
an amateur.
jpnChrName: うーん、これはまだ半人前扱いって事なのか……
jpnSearchText: うーん、これはまだ半人前扱いって事なのか……

engChrName: I've already mastered modifications. Isn't it about time I moved onto the next stage?
engSearchText:
I've already mastered modifications. Isn't it about
time I moved onto the next stage?
jpnChrName: 調整もマスターしたし、 そろそろ次の段階に進みたいんだけどな。
jpnSearchText:
調整もマスターしたし、
そろそろ次の段階に進みたいんだけどな。

engChrName: Oh, a customer? If there's anything you need, I'll gladly be of service.
engSearchText:
Oh, a customer? If there's anything you need, I'll
gladly be of service.
jpnChrName: おや、客人ですか？ 何かございましたら、私が伺いますよ。
jpnSearchText:
おや、客人ですか？
何かございましたら、私が伺いますよ。

engChrName: There’s been more travelers from the city lately, so I’ve been spending more time helping them lately.
engSearchText:
There’s been more travelers from the city lately, so
I’ve been spending more time helping them lately.
jpnChrName: 最近では街の人もたくさん来ますしね、 私が応対する機会も増えましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
最近では街の人もたくさん来ますしね、
私が応対する機会も増えましたよ。

engChrName: We might be an old-fashioned rural village, but we've started distributing more and more of our vegetables and grains to urban areas.
engSearchText:
We might be an old-fashioned rural village, but we've
started distributing more and more of our vegetables
and grains to urban areas.
jpnChrName: 見ての通り昔ながらの農村ですが、 都市部に野菜や穀類を卸す事も増えましてね。
jpnSearchText:
見ての通り昔ながらの農村ですが、
都市部に野菜や穀類を卸す事も増えましてね。

engChrName: Well, this village is full of good people, so feel free to take your time.
engSearchText:
Well, this village is full of good people, so feel free to
take your time.
jpnChrName: まあ、村の皆も気の良い者ばかりですし、 遠慮せずゆっくりして下さい。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、村の皆も気の良い者ばかりですし、
遠慮せずゆっくりして下さい。

engChrName: I've heard about the bus accident.
engSearchText: I've heard about the bus accident.
jpnChrName: バスの事故については聞いています。
jpnSearchText: バスの事故については聞いています。

engChrName: The city's becoming an indispensable market for us, but even so...
engSearchText:
The city's becoming an indispensable market for us,
but even so...
jpnChrName: 昨今では都市部へ販路も欠かせないものと なりつつありますが……
jpnSearchText:
昨今では都市部へ販路も欠かせないものと
なりつつありますが……

engChrName: This incident makes me worry about the people in our village who work in transport. I'd better have a chat with them, just to be on the safe side.
engSearchText:
This incident makes me worry about the people in
our village who work in transport. I'd better have a
chat with them, just to be on the safe side.
jpnChrName: このような事故があったとなれば、輸送に当たる 村人も心配です、念のために話しておきましょう。
jpnSearchText:
このような事故があったとなれば、輸送に当たる
村人も心配です、念のために話しておきましょう。

engChrName: Welcome. Are you guys from the capital, too?
engSearchText: Welcome. Are you guys from the capital, too?
jpnChrName: いらっしゃい、あなた達も首都から 来たのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃい、あなた達も首都から
来たのかしら？

engChrName: As I'm sure you've noticed, this is a humble little village, but more people have been making the effort to visit us for sightseeing.
engSearchText:
As I'm sure you've noticed, this is a humble little
village, but more people have been making the effort
to visit us for sightseeing.
jpnChrName: この通り慎ましやかな村だけど、 最近だと、わざわざ観光に来る人も増えてねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
この通り慎ましやかな村だけど、
最近だと、わざわざ観光に来る人も増えてねぇ。

engChrName: Since we've started exporting more of our crops to the city, word's gotten around about how lovely our village is.
engSearchText:
Since we've started exporting more of our crops to the
city, word's gotten around about how lovely our
village is.
jpnChrName: 作物の出荷で往来が増えたからか、村の魅力が 都会の方でも広まってるらしいじゃないの。
jpnSearchText:
作物の出荷で往来が増えたからか、村の魅力が
都会の方でも広まってるらしいじゃないの。

engChrName: My husband's been expanding our crop market to include urban areas, but..
engSearchText:
My husband's been expanding our crop market to
include urban areas, but..
jpnChrName: 夫は、都市部への作物の販路を拡大したり してきたけれど……
jpnSearchText:
夫は、都市部への作物の販路を拡大したり
してきたけれど……

engChrName: He's not once neglected our traditions or the thoughts of our people.
engSearchText:
He's not once neglected our traditions or the
thoughts of our people.
jpnChrName: でも、伝統や皆の思い入れを ないがしろにした事は一度も無くてね。
jpnSearchText:
でも、伝統や皆の思い入れを
ないがしろにした事は一度も無くてね。

engChrName: That balanced mentality must have been why he was put forward to become mayor.
engSearchText:
That balanced mentality must have been why he was
put forward to become mayor.
jpnChrName: こういうバランス感覚も、夫が村長に推薦された 理由なんでしょうねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
こういうバランス感覚も、夫が村長に推薦された
理由なんでしょうねぇ。

engChrName: Well now, you’re an unfamiliar face. Are you a traveler? Welcome to our church.
engSearchText:
Well now, you’re an unfamiliar face. Are you
a traveler? Welcome to our church.
jpnChrName: おや、見ない顔ですがご旅行の方ですか？ よくぞ教会にいらっしゃいましたな。
jpnSearchText:
おや、見ない顔ですがご旅行の方ですか？
よくぞ教会にいらっしゃいましたな。

engChrName: As I’m sure you’ve noticed, it’s a peaceful spot. It’s had its fare share of visitors as of late.
engSearchText:
As I’m sure you’ve noticed, it’s a peaceful spot.
It’s had its fare share of visitors as of late.
jpnChrName: 見ての通りここは穏やかな所ですからね、 昨今では観光の方も珍しくありません。
jpnSearchText:
見ての通りここは穏やかな所ですからね、
昨今では観光の方も珍しくありません。

engChrName: Not many people know this, but there are actually some ancient ruins nearby.
engSearchText:
Not many people know this, but there are actually
some ancient ruins nearby.
jpnChrName: ちなみに、あまり知られていませんが 近隣には古代の遺構もありましてね。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、あまり知られていませんが
近隣には古代の遺構もありましてね。

engChrName: It's a relic from some animistic faith. I suppose the people around here have always had a deep appreciation for nature, even in ancient times.
engSearchText:
It's a relic from some animistic faith. I suppose the
people around here have always had a deep
appreciation for nature, even in ancient times.
jpnChrName: 精霊信仰の名残りらしく、この辺りの人々は 大昔から自然を大切にしていたのでしょうな。
jpnSearchText:
精霊信仰の名残りらしく、この辺りの人々は
大昔から自然を大切にしていたのでしょうな。

engChrName: Actually, some time ago, they even dug up a big stone statue from the remains.
engSearchText:
Actually, some time ago, they even dug up a big stone
statue from the remains.
jpnChrName: 実は過去に、大きな石像が遺構から 出土した事もありましてね。
jpnSearchText:
実は過去に、大きな石像が遺構から
出土した事もありましてね。

engChrName: I was there when it was recovered, and I must say, it was a truly magnificent thing.
engSearchText:
I was there when it was recovered, and I must say, it
was a truly magnificent thing.
jpnChrName: 回収される際には私も立ち合いましたが、 いやはや、実に立派な代物でした。
jpnSearchText:
回収される際には私も立ち合いましたが、
いやはや、実に立派な代物でした。
